name: Project Power
description:
PRESS ENTER AT MENU TO PLAY WITH KEYBOARD

Final year project for university.

A simple Hack and Slash action game, with cool finishers.
Either use controller but game is optimised for Keyboard and Mouse as well.

How to Play:
Space/A to dodge, arrow/wasd to move, Left Click/X to attack, Right Click/Y to unleash finishers

Music Used: Black Betty by Spiderbait in gameplay

It will be broken and buggy at points as it was done in only 7 months by one person, but you can still have fun! :)

My portfolio
